channel.title: HTML on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Google Wave API combined with the Wookie engine and integrated in a Moodle platform
item.description: Everybody who is interesteded in Widget Mash-ups forPersonal Learning Environments (PLEs) should take a look at this article posted on Scott Wilson’s Workblog. He demonstrates a very nice usage of the Google Wave API in combination with the Wookie engine integrated into a Moodle platform. Here is a part of his blogpost: I’ve created a Moodle course that uses some widgets, all of which make use of the Wave Gadget API.

item.title: HTML 4.01 bis XHTML 2.0 im Vergleich
item.description: Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} Jens Meiert bietet auf seinem Blog eine tabellarische Übersicht über alle Elemente, die in HTML 4.01, XHTML 1.0 Strict, XHTML 1.1, HTML 5, und XHTML 2.0 spezifitiert werden. Hier der Link direkt zu Jens Meierts Weblog. [via pixelgraphix] Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} Html5 (slideshare.net) HTML+RDFa First Draft Published (w3.
